deployment.deployDescription: Deploy your application in seconds. Connect a repository or upload your code.
deployment.createProjectDescription: Create a project first, then deploy from the project page to keep a stable URL and avoid duplicate apps.
deployment.createProjectHint: This step only creates the project. You’ll deploy on the next screen.
deployment.connectGitHubRepo: Connect your GitHub repo and deploy automatically
deployment.uploadZipFile: Upload a ZIP file and deploy instantly
deployment.uploadZipDescription: Upload a ZIP file from your computer
deployment.pasteHTML: Paste HTML code and deploy in seconds
deployment.pasteHTMLDescription: Paste HTML code and deploy in seconds
deployment.connectRepoAutomatically: Connect your GitHub repo and deploy automatically
deployment.uploadAndDeploy: Upload a ZIP file and deploy instantly
deployment.pasteAndDeploy: Paste HTML code and deploy in seconds
deployment.finalizingDeployment: Finalizing your deployment... please wait while we prepare the live preview and metadata.
deployment.repoDuplicateMessage: We found an existing project for this repository ("{{name}}"). You can redeploy that project to keep the same URL, or create a new project with a different URL.
deployment.repoDuplicateCreateNew: Create new project with new URL
deployment.repoUrlRequired: Repository URL is required to deploy from GitHub.
deployment.analyzingRepository: Analyzing repository to generate project name, slug and tags...
deployment.analysisFailedFallback: Repository analysis failed, falling back to direct deployment without AI metadata.
deployment.projectCreated: Project created. You can deploy it now.
deployment.deploymentFailedDescription: Your deployment did not complete. Check the build log below, fix the issue in your project, and try deploying again.
deployment.applicationLiveAt: Your application is now live at:
deployment.finishedPreparingUrl: Deployment finished, preparing the public URL...
deployment.signInRequired: Please sign in to deploy applications.

dashboard.signInToViewProjects: Sign in to view your projects
dashboard.dashboardPrivate: Your dashboard is private. Please sign in to access your deployments and manage your apps.
dashboard.manageLiveApps: Manage your live apps and deploy new ones.
dashboard.last7Days: Last 7 days across all your apps
dashboard.showcaseDescription: Build and deploy your projects to impress recruiters and showcase your skills.
dashboard.viralContentDescription: Create engaging AI-powered apps that captivate your audience and go viral.
dashboard.internalToolsDescription: Deploy internal tools and dashboards to streamline your team's workflow.
dashboard.name: Name
dashboard.getStartedDeploy: Get started by deploying your first app
dashboard.noFavoriteProjectsDesc: You haven't favorited any projects yet. You can favorite apps you like from the Explore page.

explore.adjustSearch: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria
explore.publishToMarketplace: Publish your Gemini-powered applications to the marketplace. You earn
explore.ofCreditRevenue: of the credit revenue every time someone uses your app.

project.displayNamePlaceholder: Friendly app name shown in Explore
project.slugHintEditable: You can change the slug until the first successful deployment.
project.slugHintLocked: Slug is locked after the first successful deployment.
project.descriptionPlaceholder: Short summary used on the Explore Apps page
project.likeAndFavoriteDescription: Express appreciation or save this app to your favorites.
project.showInExploreDescription: Turn this off if you want to keep the app private to your dashboard.
project.thumbnailDescription: This image is used on the Explore page and previews. You can upload your own image to override the automatic screenshot.
project.thumbnailPasteHint: Tip: you can also paste an image here from your clipboard.
project.repoUrlDescription: This URL is used when you redeploy from GitHub. ZIP-based deployments do not overwrite this setting.
project.zipDeploymentNote: ZIP deployments are one-off: the uploaded archive is only used for the current deployment. Your GitHub URL stays configured and can be used again later.
project.htmlDeploymentNote: HTML deployments use the inline HTML saved on this project, or the uploaded .html file for the current deployment.
project.deleteDescription: Deleting a project hides it from your dashboard and public feeds. Its URL and analytics slug will remain reserved and cannot be reused.
project.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This action cannot be undone.
project.failedToDelete: Failed to delete project. Please try again.
project.repoAutoSaved: Repository URL saved automatically before deployment

profile.title: My profile
profile.bioPlaceholder: Introduce yourself to the community. What are you building?
profile.linksEmptyHint: Add links to your GitHub, X, personal website or any other social profile.
profile.handleErrorCharset: Handle can only contain lowercase letters, numbers and dashes.
profile.pinnedApps: Pinned apps on your public page
profile.pinnedAppsDescription: Choose a few of your apps to highlight at the top of your public profile.
profile.noPublicApps: You don't have any public apps yet.
profile.noPublicAppsHint: Deploy and mark apps as public to showcase them here.
profile.updateError: Failed to update profile. Please try again.
profile.signInRequiredTitle: Sign in to create your profile
profile.signInRequiredDescription: Your profile lets you showcase your apps, share a public page and join the community.
profile.creatorNoPublicApps: This creator hasn't published any public apps yet.
profile.profileNotFound: This profile does not exist or is not available.
profile.noBioOrLinks: This creator hasn't added a bio or links yet.
profile.clickToPin: Click on an app card to pin it
